Class MenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • sixmensmorris.Screen
              • sixmensmorris.MenuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MenuView
extends Screen
    Defines a view for the menu screen. This is the first GUI that appears that the user can interact with.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Kelvin Lin, Hasan Siddiqui, Jeremy Klotz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
